name: Total Drift
description:
TOTAL DRIFT

Do you like cars?  

Do you like Drifting?

Well then you will absolutely love this game...

Total drift is a Arcade drift game reimagined for the current era.

FEATURES - Over 12 cars and counting (not including the hidden ones!!!), accurate low poly car models, 2 tracks with more on the way, realistic drift physics (well realisticish), And much more..

CARS

  • Nissan 180sx 
  • Porsche 911
  • Toyota Ae86
  • VW Beetle
  • Nissan Fairlady
  • Ford Mustang
  • Subaru WRX
  • Toyota Hilux
  • Holden Commodore
  • Formula 1 car
  • Nissan 370Z
  • Nissan R34

*see if you can find all the Easter eggs 😉*
